entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kuujjuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 41. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
